DataElement.preferredName: Novel Substance Use in 30 Days Prior To Blood Specimen Collection Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No indicator to signify if a novel substance was used within the 30 days prior to specimen collection.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Novel Substance Use in 30 Days Prior To Blood Specimen Collection
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before._A material with particular features._The act of administration._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::30_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._The taking of a blood sample to determine its character as a whole, to identify levels of its component cells, chemicals, gases, or other constituents, to perform pathological examination, etc.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.:A material with particular features.:The act of administration.

Concepts.definition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.
Any matter of defined composition that has discrete existence, whose origin may be biological, mineral or chemical.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

Property.preferredName: Integer::30 Day Prior To Blood Specimen Collection
Property.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::30:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.       :Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:The taking of a blood sample to determine its character as a whole, to identify levels of its component cells, chemicals, gases, or other constituents, to perform pathological examination, etc.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
The taking of a blood sample to determine its character as a whole, to identify levels of its component cells, chemicals, gases, or other constituents, to perform pathological examination, etc.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Use of any novel (ie not come
ReferenceDocuments.description: Use of any novel (ie not comercially available) drug compound within 30 days prior to the collection of T2 blood specimens.
